comment: Dr. Wells is SUPER nice! She is a solid professor who engages the students and tries to make learning fun and interactive. The textbook she provided online. Attendance was not really mandatory but it is somewhat helpful if you go. The class was kind of pointless but its an easy A.
Gives good feedback. You learn a lot from her. She cares a lot.

Dr. Wells is the best. You can tell she is a genuinely good person. We had one test and one final. Show up, do your work, be respectful, and you'll get an A. She really understands students and is always willing to talk about things off topic if you need to.

Dr. Wells is a great teacher and she really values her students. The class was filled with information and presented in activities rather than lectures. She is cool and understands her students' needs, while still being stern and productive.
